nodes.text: Gark, also known as Gark the Indomitable, was a male Gamorrean and leader of Gamorrean warriors that joined Darth Malgus' New Empire during the Galactic War. He was killed during the Battle of Ilum.
Gark the Indomitable appears as the first boss in "The Battle of Ilum," one of the original endgame Flashpoints for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
